item.title: By: rogerglewis
item.dc:creator: rogerglewis
item.description:
1 THOUGHT ON “#165. TO CATCH A FALLING KNIFE” Simon Hodges on February 29, 2020 at 7:30 pm said: This is all about nCov and supply chains. Nothing to do with energy. The effects will be 10X worse than the GFC.
Reply ↓
rogerglewis on February 29, 2020 at 7:45 pm said: Your comment is awaiting moderation. Agreed. There is something of the Problem of the Tool here. If the only tool one has is a Hammer then sooner or later all problems turn into Nails.
item.content:encoded:
1 THOUGHT ON “#165. TO CATCH A FALLING KNIFE”
Simon Hodges on February 29, 2020 at 7:30 pm said:
This is all about nCov and supply chains. Nothing to do with energy. The effects will be 10X worse than the GFC.

Reply ↓

rogerglewis
on February 29, 2020 at 7:45 pm said:
Your comment is awaiting moderation.
Agreed. There is something of the Problem of the Tool here. If the only tool one has is a Hammer then sooner or later all problems turn into Nails.
